readable.content: A boy wearing a blue helmet rides a bike with his feet on the handlebars . A boy with a blue helmet plays on his bicycle . A little boy with a blue helmet rides his bike with his feet on the handlebars . Boy in blue helmet riding bike with feet on handlebars . Boy with a helmet resting his feet on the handlebars of his bike .
